Articles.Content:
I have this weird feeling. I imagine that when the final version of KSP is released everyone on the forums now can say to the new people.

Well you know what? We played the ORIGINAL KSP! 8)

Also, 200th post 8)

1st: Not quite 200, off-topic posts don\'t count. ;P

3rd: Yes, and I especially can say that I found it all on my lonesome (by that, I mean it didn\'t take a YouTube celebrity to tell me about it *cough* yogcast *cough*)

5th: You probably just realized there is no 2nd

6th: And you just realized that there was no 4th

7th: And you just double-checked the last one to make sure
